original_title: Jack Bruce - Rockpalast: The 50th Birthday Concerts
overview: Jack Bruce invited a lot of friends for a very special Rockpalast-concert to celebrate his 50th birthday! The list of attendees is a kind of ""Who is Who"" in Rock and Jazz: Ginger Baker and Simon Phillips on drums, Clem Clempson and Gary Moore on guitar, Dick Hecksatll-Smith and Art Themen on saxophone, Bernie Worrell and Gary Husband on keyboards, Maggie Reilly and Gary Cooper on vocals, just to neme a few. A truly remarkable event captured on two concert DVDs. This edition comes in a double DVD digi with a 12-page booklet, new linernotes and previously unreleased fotos!
title: Jack Bruce - Rockpalast: The 50th Birthday Concerts
